name: Game about avoid obstacles!
description:
Game about avoid obstacles! is a simple game where u have to avoid falling objects as a square. 

The game has:

  • 4 thematically different levels with uniqe challenges
  • 16 customized skins
  • 2 power-ups that may help you

I created this because I wanted to play something short while waiting for a match in League of Legends. Game grown so big that I figured I'd share it.
